pages.title: Flora
pages.text: Decorative plants and worldgen trees that add color, resources, and ambience to the wilds.

pages.title: Flowers & Flora
pages.text: $(li)Begonia — Plains; yields Pink Dye$(br)$(li)Lavender — Taiga; yields Purple Dye$(br)$(li)Dahlia — Forest; yields Orange Dye$(br)$(li)Nightshade Bush — yields Black Dye$(br)$(li)Pale Mushroom — decorative, emits a soft glow

pages.title: Cottonwood Tree
pages.text: Common in $(bold)Swamps$(). Catkins yield String; trunks can be tapped with an $(l:hexalia:content/tools#athame)Athame$(/l) for $(l:hexalia:resources/natural_resources#tree_resin)Tree Resin$(/l). Silk Worm Cocoons may spawn on trunks.

pages.title: Willow Tree
pages.text: Found in $(bold)Mangrove Swamps$(). Sweeping branches and naturally generated $(thing)Willow Logs$() give these trees an ancient, overgrown look.
